name: Luminate Medical
headline: We build medical devices to stop the side effects of cancer treatment.
description: We make devices that help cancer patients prevent the side effects of cancer treatment, including hair loss, neuropathy and infertility. Our first product, Lily, is a wearable cap that enables chemotherapy patients to prevent hair loss in a comfortable, portable way, while our second product, Lilac, is the world's first device to prevent the peripheral nerve damage caused by cancer treatment.

founders.name: Aaron Hannon, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder and CEO of Luminate Medical. Software and electronic engineer with a passion for medical devices and a better citizen experience of medicine. Thiel Fellowship, Class of 2020.

founders.name: Barbara Oliveira, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder and Clinical Lead of Luminate Medical, a start up medical device company based in Galway, Ireland working on empowering patients during their cancer & chemotherapy journey. Biomedical Engineer by background, with experience in leading first-in-human medical device clinical trials, and a passion for quality of life applications of medicine!

## Better, more affordable cancer care. At home.
[Prevent Hair Loss](http://www.luminatemed.com/<https:/www.luminatemed.com/products>)

[See why we do it](http://www.luminatemed.com/<https:/www.luminatemed.com>)
Why
Safety
## Side effects are the #1 cause of cancer treatment withdrawal
Peripheral nerve damage (neuropathy) is the leading reason for cessation of cancer treatment using anti-body drug conjugates and commonly used chemotherapy regimens. Our therapy aims to prevent the onset of neuropathy and help patients stay on treatment.
of patients in anti-body drug conjugate trials are withdrawn due to peripheral neuropathy
## 28%
Impact
## And cause the most traumatic part of cancer for patients
The majority of cancer patients consider hair loss the most traumatic aspect of cancer treatment. Our Lily therapy aims to prevent hair loss from occuring at any stage during cancer care.
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/d41c11_543e0d1bfbda420f92267113c9567cbb~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_160,h_176,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_3,enc_avif,quality_auto/d41c11_543e0d1bfbda420f92267113c9567cbb~mv2.jpg)
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/d41c11_499ed65153fd42a5ab445e0a93aaae88~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_154,h_169,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_3,enc_avif,quality_auto/d41c11_499ed65153fd42a5ab445e0a93aaae88~mv2.png)
Scale
## While costing 6 times as much as cancer therapeutics
Medicare spends $146B on treatment services and survivorship, compared to $26B on the cost of therapeutics for treating cancer
## So we build technologies that enable cancer treatment to be delivered at home
We aim to transform the physical experience of cancer care by building the technology to enable with current and future generations of cancer treatment to be delivered from the patient's home.
[Discover our technologies](http://www.luminatemed.com/<https:/www.luminatemed.com/products>)
Impact
Scale
![cropped header.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/d41c11_9a30fab08cbf410c8717faca128fc3f2~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_60,h_23,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/cropped%20header.png)
## Our mission is simple: Therapeutics treat cancer. We take care of people with cancer.
Our team of experts in oncology is dedicated to helping millions of people with cancer to control or reduce treatment side effects like hair loss, neuropathy, and infertility. 
[About us](http://www.luminatemed.com/<https:/www.luminatemed.com/about>)
OUR SOLUTIONS
Lilac
## We aim to provide solutions across the spectrum of cancer side effects.
## Lily: Preventing the most feared side effect of cancer treatment - hair loss.
Hair loss is one of the most difficult aspects of cancer treatment. Our aim is to build technology that enables patients to reduce their risk of hair loss in a portable way - meaning less time spent in the infusion chair.
[For Patients](http://www.luminatemed.com/<https:/www.luminatemed.com/for-patients>)
[For Physicians and Providers](http://www.luminatemed.com/<https:/www.luminatemed.com/for-physicians>)
## Lilac: Impacting the #1 source of ADC and chemo discontinuation.
Peripheral neuropathy is one of the most common side effects of anti-cancer treatment, and is the single biggest cause of treatment discontinuation for next-wave ADC therapeutics. Our technology aims to reduce the the onset of peripheral nerve damage in patients undergoing chemotherapy treatment. 
[For Patients](http://www.luminatemed.com/<https:/www.luminatemed.com/for-patients>)
[For Physicians and Providers](http://www.luminatemed.com/<https:/www.luminatemed.com/for-physicians>)
## Pipeline: Changing the future of cancer care
We're researching conditions secondary to cancer care that impact patient quality of life - like lymphedema, early onset menopause and post-treatment fertility issues. 
[For Physicians and Researchers](http://www.luminatemed.com/<https:/www.luminatemed.com/for-physicians>)

generated_description:
### Luminate Medical: Innovating Cancer Care

**Company Overview**
Founded in 2019 and located in Galway, Ireland, Luminate Medical is on a mission to mitigate the distress caused by cancer treatments. They're doing this by creating medical devices designed to prevent the harsh side effects of chemotherapy such as hair loss, neuropathy, and infertility. The company, which is a product of the Y Combinator Batch S21, has a team of 36 employees working to revolutionize cancer care.

**Core Products**
- **Lily:** This portable, wearable cap is a game-changer for chemotherapy patients, allowing them to prevent hair loss—a significant concern for many undergoing treatment.
  
- **Lilac:** This innovative device stands as the first of its kind aimed at preventing peripheral nerve damage (neuropathy) associated with cancer treatments, which is a leading cause of treatment discontinuation. 

**The Problem They Address**
Cancer treatment comes with a laundry list of unpleasant side effects. These often lead to treatment withdrawal, with up to 28% of patients in antibody-drug conjugate trials ceasing due to neuropathy. For many, hair loss is not just a minor inconvenience—it's one of the most traumatic parts of their experience with cancer.

**Vision for the Future**
Luminate Medical isn't just about existing products. They’re exploring more ways to enhance patients' quality of life through research into conditions like lymphedema and post-treatment fertility issues. Their ultimate vision is to transform cancer care, enabling therapies to be administered at home, thereby making it more accessible and comfortable for patients.

**Why It Matters**
The financial burden of cancer care is staggering, with Medicare spending significantly more on treatment services than on therapeutic costs. Luminate’s focus on at-home solutions could not only alleviate patient stress but could also lead to substantial cost savings in cancer care by reducing the reliance on in-hospital services.

Whether you’re a patient, a healthcare professional, or just someone interested in the future of medical technology, Luminate Medical intends to lead the way in compassionate cancer care. They’re not just treating cancer; they're taking care of people living with it.

For more information, check out their website at [Luminate Medical](http://www.luminatemed.com).
